page.title: A different blog title
page.author: Adam Spruijt
page.content:
<p>Decoder Ring Theatre's shows are available for free download in mp3 format, either directly from our site, via the <a href="http://decoderring.libsyn.com/rss">Podcast Feed</a> or subscribe in <a href="http://phobos.apple.com/WebObjects/MZStore.woa/wa/viewPodcast?id=79497721&s=143455">iTunes</a>. Or if you prefer, use the handy player beside each episode.. Please explore and enjoy the pulse-pounding thrills of <strong>The Red Panda Adventures,</strong> the noir stylings of <strong>Black Jack Justice</strong> and the grab-bag of suspense, science fiction and comedy found in our <strong>Showcase</strong>. Each episode is a stand-alone</p><hr><hr id="horizontalrule"><ul> 
<li>story and you </li><li>can begin </li><li>where</li><li>ver you'd like!</li></ul><p>If you enjoy these programs, and wish to see them continue, please show your love with <strong>a donation</strong> through our convenient Paypal links, by shopping in our online stores and by visiting some of our links to connect with us and other listeners!</p>
